item: Virtual Field Trip (VFT) observations and report on the origin of life on Earth
description: Part A: Observe life prevalence in alkali/acid hot springs via VFT, answer 4 questions (10%). Part B: 1,000-word report comparing land-based and deep-sea systems (20%).

item: Groupwork video or alternative mode of presentation
description: Group project (2-3 students) investigating potential for life on Europa (Jupiter's moon) and comparing with Enceladus (Saturn's moon). 4-5 minute video or alternative presentation format.

item: Report on 'Life elsewhere in the universe'
description: Part A: Three short-answer questions about Mars life search. Part B: 1,800-2,000 word analysis using Drake Equation to evaluate existence of extraterrestrial life.
